Web design trends in 2022

1. Retro

Modern designers are returning to the sources of the Internet. In the era of the nineties and early zero on the sites were a lot of annoying gifs. Acid shades, stickers, which are used to decorate the covers of notebooks, and pixel fonts are back in fashion.

2. Geometric shapes

Mixing patterns and shapes allows you to achieve amazing results. Use colorful triangles, squares and bold zigzags with your mind. It is desirable to find a balance between bright elements and a blank background. Then the design will be less cumbersome.

3. Antidesign and brutalism

Web design courses will teach you how to create layouts that are beautiful and user-friendly. But the individual style will have to look for yourself. Sometimes it contradicts aesthetic norms. Fortunately, one of the trends of 2022 is breaking the rules. It is characterized by controversial color combinations, asymmetry and a large number of graphic objects. Everything is so bad that even good.

4. Illustrations

The characters that accompany users are becoming more and more common on websites. They help to orient in the structure and at the same time demonstrate the products. For example, offer to look in the next tab or pick up the bonus. No need to bother with drawing shadows, realism and anatomy. Trends approve of wrong proportions.

5. Moving text

Or kinetic typography. When creating an animation, keep in mind that text is a source of information. If the captions run on the screen very fast, it cannot be read. Of course, you should use clear contrasting fonts to the background color.

Moving inscriptions are an interesting accent, and it is better to apply it pointwise. You can animate the logo, slogan or main idea of the section. The appearance of voluminous text will slow down the loading of the page. The most common techniques are morphing, resizing, circular motion, smooth movement.
